articles.title: 2023 MacBook Pro 14 with Apple M2 Pro on sale for its lowest price yet on Amazon - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: The well-built base model from the current 2023 MacBook Pro lineup can now be ordered for a reduced sale price of US$1,749 after Amazon introduced a notable 12 percent discount on the very quick 14-inch multimedia laptop with the lightning-fast Apple M2 SoC.
